entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I assist you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse I bought like, two weeks ago.
Okay, I can help you with that. Could you please provide your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Ugh, one sec... Okay, it's jane.doe@email.com. This is ridiculous. I haven't even used the stupid thing.
Thank you, Ms. Doe. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse purchased on the 1st of the month. What is the reason for the return?
It's just not what I expected. The sleep tracking is awful, and the heart rate monitor keeps cutting out. Basically, the VeloBand Pulse is useless. I want my money back.

I understand your frustration, Ms. Doe. Our standard return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase. Therefore, you are well within the timeframe to return the VeloBand Pulse for a full refund.
90 days? Really? The website said something about 'final sale' or something. I was worried I was stuck with this thing. I'm glad you guys actually honor returns. So, what do I do?

Yes, our general return policy is 90 days. To initiate the return, I'll email you a prepaid shipping label. Simply repackage the VeloBand Pulse, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, the refund will be processed back to your original payment method.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. What about the smart watch I got my husband? Is that the same return timeframe?

Yes, the same 90 days applies to all of our smart watch products unless otherwise noted on the product page, which the VeloBand Pulse does not have. You do not need to speak to a manager, I can fully assist you.
Perfect! Thank you so much! That's a huge relief. I'll keep an eye out for the email. Really appreciate you clarifying the return policy. I thought I only had 10 days.
You're very welcome, Ms. Doe. I'm happy I could assist you. Please allow 24-48 hours for the email to arrive. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
You're welcome. Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. Have a great day!
